import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Tab, Nav, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import Contacts from './Contacts' import Conversation from './Conversations' import NewConversationModal from './NewConversationModal' import NewContactModal from './NewContactModal' const CONVERSATIONS_KEY = 'conversations' const CONTACTS_KEY = 'contacts' export default function Sidebar({ id }) { const [activeKey, setActiveKey] = useState(CONVERSATIONS_KEY) const [modalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(false) const conversationsOpen = activeKey === CONVERSATIONS_KEY const closeModal = ()=>{ setModalOpen(false) } return (
Conversation Contacts
Your Id: {id}
{ conversationsOpen ? : }
) }
